com.ibm.team.interop.common

Interface IExternalRepositoryConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IExternalRepositoryConnectionHandle, IItem, IItemHandle, IManagedItem, IManagedItemHandle, ISimpleItem, ISimpleItemHandle

    public interface IExternalRepositoryConnection
extends IExternalRepositoryConnectionHandle, ISimpleItem
    Represents a connection to an external repository. If an external object manager requires connection information in order to access an external repository, it can obtain it from an instance of this class, which must be referenced by any synchronization rules used for the external repository.
    Since:
    0.6

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of this external repository connection.

        This is a required property. It is a SMALL string.

        Returns:
        the external repository connection name; only null or empty for an uninitialized, unsaved item

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Set the name of this external repository connection.

        This is a required property. It is a SMALL string.

        Parameters:
        name - the connection name; must not be null or empty

      • getConnectionInfo

        java.lang.String getConnectionInfo()
        Get any connection info for this external repository connection. The format of this information is defined by the external repository manager(s) that use this connection. (It could be a URL, for example.)

        This is an optional property. It is a MEDIUM string.

        Returns:
        any connection info; may be null or empty

      • setConnectionInfo

        void setConnectionInfo(java.lang.String info)
        Set any connection info for this external repository connection.

        This is an optional property. It is a MEDIUM string.

        Parameters:
        info - optional connection info; may be null or empty
        See Also:
        getConnectionInfo()

      • isOutgoingSyncDisabled

        boolean isOutgoingSyncDisabled()
        Determine whether outgoing synchronization has been disabled for this external repository connection. If synchronization has been disabled, then the periodic outgoing synchronization task that looks for changed items will ignore any synchronization rules that reference this external connection, until synchronization has been enabled again. (When synchronization is re-enabled, all changes made since it was last enabled are considered; disabling synchronization doesn't cause changes to be skipped.)
        Returns:
        true if outgoing synchronization has been disabled, false if not

      • setOutgoingSyncDisabled

        void setOutgoingSyncDisabled(boolean value)
        Set whether outgoing synchronization should be disabled for this external repository connection.
        Parameters:
        value - true to disable outgoing synchronization, false to enable it
        See Also:
        isOutgoingSyncDisabled()

      • getProjectArea

        IProjectAreaHandle getProjectArea()
        Get any project area associated with this item. The project area is used to determine the process permissions that are required for creating, modifying, and deleting external repository connection items.
        Returns:
        handle for any associated project area, or null if none

      • setProjectArea

        void setProjectArea(IProjectAreaHandle projectAreaHandle)
        Set any associated project area for this item.
        Parameters:
        projectAreaHandle - handle for the project area to associate with this item, or null to unassociate from any project area
